duties_responsibilities.duty: Take ownership of an assigned territory focused on net new logo and upsell opportunities, while using the greater Cisco ecosystem.
Demonstrate expertise in building business cases which clearly show value and differentiation at all levels of customer organizations including C-level executives.
Constantly generate pipeline using creative techniques, tools, team collaboration, industry events, and channel partners.

Close deals through elite planning and preparation, developing and cultivating relationships with enterprise organizations, as well as be consultative in your approach to solving sophisticated real business problems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
